thread.title: Apple sells 13 million iPhone 6s devices, beats 2014 record
thread.title_full: Apple sells 13 million iPhone 6s devices, beats 2014 record - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Wendy Lee
title: Apple sells 13 million iPhone 6s devices, beats 2014 record
text:
Photo: Paul Chinn, The Chronicle Sydney Kasahara (left) and Michelle Lett hold their dogs Stevi and Vivi while they wait in line to buy a new iPhone 6S at the Apple Store on Stockton Street in San Francisco. Sydney Kasahara (left) and Michelle Lett hold their dogs Stevi and...
Apple said Monday it has beaten last year’s record for most iPhones sold in its first weekend, with more than 13 million 6s and 6s Plus devices snapped up by consumers. Sydney Kasahara (left) and Michelle Lett hold their dogs Stevi and Vivi while they wait in line to buy a new iPhone 6S at the Apple Store on Stockton Street in San Francisco. Sydney Kasahara (left) and Michelle Lett hold their dogs Stevi and...
Apple said Monday it has beaten last year’s record for most iPhones sold in its first weekend, with more than 13 million 6s and 6s Plus devices snapped up by consumers.
